title: Social Media - SMPost
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic SMPost made for the Social Media domain.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to SMPost.

postId.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The  post ID of the SMPost.

hasLanguage.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The language of the post.

hasPostURL.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The URL of the post.

hasText.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The text of the post.

hasImage.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The image URL of the post.

hasVideo.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The video URL of the post.

hasPrivacyLevel.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The privacy setting of the post.

hasHashtag.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The hashtags of the post.

hasThumbnail.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The thumbnail URL of the post.

likes.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'No unit'. The number of likes of the post. All units are accepted in [CEFACT](https://www.unece.org/cefact.html) code.

createdBy.description: Relationship.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The ID of the SMUser that created this post.

hasReferencedLocation.description: Relationship.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The ID of the referenced location of this post.

hasMentions.description: Relationship.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The ID of the SMUser that has mentions in this post.

hasAnalysis.description: Relationship.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The ID of the SMAnalysis that analyzes this post.

belongsToCollection.description: Relationship.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The ID of the SMCollection, which this post is a part of.
